sentences.en: A rickety chair was about all the furniture he had.
sentences.cn: 一把摇摇晃晃的破椅子差不多就是他的全部家当了.
一把摇摇晃晃的旧木椅

sentences.en: And there were babies with thin rickety legs and mothers who could not nurse them.
sentences.cn: 有些婴儿两条腿细得像患伺偻病似的,还有些母亲没奶喂孩子.

sentences.en: As Dorian hurried up its three rickety steps, the heavy odour of opium met him.
sentences.cn: 道林快步走上那三级不住晃动的梯级时, 闻到了浓重的鸦片烟味.

sentences.en: He followed her up a rickety staircase to a squalid bedsit.
sentences.cn: 他跟着她上了一段摇摇晃晃的楼梯，来到了一间邋遢的卧室起居室两用房间。

sentences.en: He was precautious in crossing the rickety bridge.
sentences.cn: 走过这座摇摇晃晃的桥时他小心翼翼.

sentences.en: He was scared to cross the rickety bridge.
sentences.cn: 他害怕过那座摇晃的桥.

sentences.en: I was working at a rickety table.
sentences.cn: 我正在一张摇摇晃晃的桌子边工作.

sentences.en: Mona climbed the rickety wooden stairs.
sentences.cn: 莫娜爬上了摇摇晃晃的木楼梯。

sentences.en: Mona climbed the rickety wooden stairway.
sentences.cn: 莫娜爬上了摇摇晃晃的木楼梯。

sentences.en: The chair is a bit rickety [ shaky ] .
The front - room upstairs was furnished with three rickety beds and one square table.
sentences.cn: 楼上的“前楼”摆着三只破床,却只有一张方桌子.
这个东倒西歪的粮仓该修理了.

sentences.en: The rickety little waggon was already laden.
sentences.cn: 那辆摇摇晃晃的货车,已经装好了车子.

sentences.en: This entire rickety structure was hanging from the limb of an enormous leafy tree.
sentences.cn: 这整个快要散架的搭建物吊挂在一棵枝繁叶茂的大树的枝杈上。

sentences.en: Though the bridge is a bit rickety, there is no immediate danger in walking over it.
sentences.cn: 桥虽然有点摇晃, 但在上面走还不会有什么危险.

trans.tran_cn: 连接处不牢固的，快要散架的
trans.tran_en: A rickety structure or piece of furniture is not very strong or well made, and seems likely to collapse or break
